Description:
The number one security hole is a weak password. Companies are growing without a complete control over exposed services; most of the servers are deployed with default password. Most of the tools today are single host-based, without competing on a cloud/global environment. Configuration and deployment are getting faster -all the services are going in pipeline with automation and scalability focus.

Infosec tools need to evolve. The project goal of Yaps *yet another password scanner:*
